name: Laudable
headline: App for B2B companies to find customer stories and advocates
description: Laudable finds happy customers and their success stories hiding in your existing data - like call recordings, NPS, salesforce logs - and auto-generates case study content.

# Unlock and use your  customer proof.
Laudable finds customer advocates using the data in your call recordings, using AI to create social proof like testimonials, G2 reviews, and case studies. Then, find the right customer proof data for any deal or occasion - right in Slack.
[Book a demo](https://www.laudable.com/<#>)[Watch a demo](https://www.laudable.com/<#>)
Trusted by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e7a2af1c654574ab9579ead/63cacc2a1de1bc5813e9ea9c_62c4eddb1a459185888169db_idvZ0Jsb-q.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e7a2af1c654574ab9579ead/63cacc2a1de1bcdf5fe9eaa4_62c4ede88277f285c835a9f4_6201434ebeae0fd1206873cb_Vector12.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e7a2af1c654574ab9579ead/65cd9b54929e7e1c64c89058_usergems%20logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e7a2af1c654574ab9579ead/65cd9c377cfa50e20673527d_ada%20support.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e7a2af1c654574ab9579ead/65cd9a8232273d0eb6152bab_sigma%20computing.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e7a2af1c654574ab9579ead/6445e137857e36efa8cffab0_g2%20trans.png)
## Use Laudable to

Find hundreds of happy customer moments hiding in your call recordings
Get on-demand customer proof and quotes for any deal
Create holy sh*t moment videos to boost demand gen performance
Build competitive landing pages

Repurpose customer content like case study interviews
Find happy customer moments in reviews and call recordings

Produce branded video testimonials
Build competitive landing pages
Generate customer testimonials for paid ads
Create customer proof audiograms for social media
## Two ways to use Laudable to capture stories.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e7a2af1c654574ab9579ead/63cad5731de1bc2145ea733d_Arrow.svg)
Connect Gong / Chorus / call recorder to uncover hidden customer stories and advocates. And/or have us edit your customer footage into high impact videos.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e7a2af1c654574ab9579ead/63d1a6ce09bec50c8fbfeb57_bottom%20layer.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e7a2af1c654574ab9579ead/63d8410d957dbe2b542bd758_Card%201%20-%20SaaS.webp)
[Auto Stories Software](https://www.laudable.com/</ai-customer-testimonials>)
### Unlock hundreds of customer stories and testimonials
Laudable connects to Gong, Chorus, or your call recorder to find and generate testimonials and case studies from the data you already have.
#### [Explore Auto Stories Software >>](https://www.laudable.com/</ai-customer-testimonials>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e7a2af1c654574ab9579ead/63cad9876e864ad19b4c778a_Component%2025.png)
[Video Editing Services](https://www.laudable.com/</video-testimonial-services>)
### Get branded video testimonials done by a pro
Laudable will edit your customer footage and deliver professionally edited, branded, and designed videos.
#### [Explore Video Testimonial Services >>](https://www.laudable.com/</video-testimonial-services>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e7a2af1c654574ab9579ead/63d904e0f06e4a93910872b4_high%20res.png)

generated_description:
**Laudable: Elevating Customer Stories for B2B Success**

Laudable is on a mission to help B2B companies uncover and amplify the success stories of their happy customers. Founded as part of the Y Combinator Batch S21, Laudable pivots on a simple yet powerful idea: leverage existing customer dataâ€”like call recordings and Salesforce logsâ€”to auto-generate compelling case studies that truly resonate with potential clients.

### What They Do

With a robust team of five and guided by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer, Laudable embodies a modern SaaS solution that bridges the gap between customer experiences and marketing strategies. The company's core offerings include:

- **Auto Stories**: This functionality utilizes AI to sift through call recordings, extracting advocates and their success narratives. It turns idle data into engaging content, making it easy for companies to curate their customer stories.

- **Proof Assistant**: This tool aids in sourcing targeted wins and references that sales teams can present to prospects, enhancing the overall sales narrative.

### Features & Benefits

Laudable is designed with a user-centric approach. Here are some ways it can revolutionize a company's customer marketing strategy:

1. **Uncover Hidden Testimonials**: By connecting with tools like Gong and Chorus, companies can unveil valuable customer moments that might otherwise remain unnoticed.

2. **On-Demand Customer Proof**: Generate quotes and case studies swiftly, making it easy to respond to sales opportunities.

3. **Engaging Video Content**: Transform customer interactions into impactful video testimonials or social proof audiograms for social media channels.

4. **Searchable Customer Insights**: All the customer proof data can be accessed directly in platforms like Slack, making it incredibly convenient during sales discussions.
